name: kinkydungeoninterfacewrapper
description: Code gen project creating convenience wrapper for kinky dungeon

scripts.clean: npx rimraf Build/* Include/* Generated/* Deploy/* --glob
scripts.copy-asset: npx copyfiles -u 1 GeneratedProjectAsset/**/* Generated && npx copyfiles -u 1 PackageAsset/**/* Deploy
scripts.generate: npm run build-generator && npm run run-generator && npm run copy-asset && npm run build-generated && npm run rename-emited-files
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run generate

author: Balababa2143@gmail.com
